Package recommender

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProfileItem
    Interface that marks items that possess a POIProfile
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    POIDataModel
    Overrides the Mahout DataModel to process POIProfiles
    POIProfile
    Defines the preference to the six tourist categories sightseeing, culture, food, nightlife, nature and shopping.
    ProfileSimilarity
    Class that overrides the Mahout interface UserSimilarity.
    Recommender
    The recommender in which the tourist recommendations are calculated.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Preference
    Enum that indicates the preference for tourist categories.
